TopicTitle: Is This a Mod? or new parts for 0.17!

Articles.Content:
I was wondering about this pic. Is this a mod or are these new parts becuase that command module looks sick! (In a good way)

Feel free to answer if u know? Here is the Pic:
you goggle at the capsule, I marvel at the payload bay. finally!
The fairing is from the Silisko Edition parts pack. The mini SRBs are a new part, not sure about the adapter though(really hope it is, I want my rockets to look pretty!).

So it is new parts?

lol and i want my rockects to look pretty too

I dont want any round top rockets! I WaNT POINTY ONES!

Ones that will make kerbals say: "WTF ITS A ICBM"!!!

So are these parts new for 0.17 or is this edition pack a mod or something?

Edited August 29, 2012 by cocomoe1002
These aren't new parts. They're Sillisko's ancient mods from before he was a dev.
AWW i rlly wanted it to be new parts but were can i download the mod?
It is available here. Be warned, it may not work anymore, and Nova is no longer working on it.

If you want pointy rockets I highly recommend the Payload Pack from MMI:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/13692-Mechanical-Mouse-Industries-Kethane-Payload-Packs-Released%21%21%21

It is separate from the Kethane mod and adds a bunch of different payload fairings/AHEM/ pointy things.
